title: 460ML Green Soap
desc: Discover the versatility of Green Soap in various scenarios:/nTattoo Skin Wash: Ideal for cleaning the tattooed area before and after the process, ensuring cleanliness and disinfection./nDried Blood and Skin Residue: Effectively removes already dry blood and skin residues, maintaining a clear workspace./li>/nSurgical Instruments and Equipment: A reliable tool for cleaning surgical instruments and equipment, promoting hygiene./nEveryday Hygiene: Extend its benefits to your daily routine by using it for handwashing or hair cleansing
